title: Chapter 1162 - A Sword Amongst The Stars
volume_title: Sword In Hand, He Stands Above The Wilds, Sovereign Throughout The Ages
body:
Chapter 1162 - A Sword Amongst The Stars

Heaven and earth were silent and still.

An oppressive, stifling atmosphere filled the air.

“Despicable?” Xue Zining said flatly. “In our eyes, those beneath the World King level are mere ants. What right do you have to criticize us?”

Her voice was rife with contempt.

Mo Changkong of the Church of the River of Stars said leisurely, “If you want to live, you’re welcome to convince Su Xuanjun to send himself to his death of his own accord.”

Third Warden Yu Baichuan of the Nine Heavens Pavilion couldn’t help but laugh, “Sacrificing him will ensure the lives of everyone in the Wilds. What… a worthy trade-off!”

Ancestor Peng, the Heavensdeath Demon Empress, and the old glutton were so angry that their lungs practically exploded, and their expressions were unsightly to the extreme.

Who could have imagined that these experts from outer space would be this brutal, despicable, and cold-blooded?

They’d even resort to underhanded means to achieve their ends!

“No need to lose your temper over this. It’s not worth it.” Su Yi shook his head slightly, indicating that they should calm down.

“You have the time it takes to brew a cup of tea. If Su Xuanjun hasn’t come to his death by then, we’ll paint the Wilds...
original_title: Chapter 1162 - A Sword Amongst the Stars
